title: 02/02/2021 - HOUR 3 - Tom Brady The Beloved Superstar, Trent Dilfer and Danny Amendola
itunes:title: 02/02/2021 - HOUR 3 - Tom Brady The Beloved Superstar, Trent Dilfer and Danny Amendola
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin welcomes in Super Bowl champion and NFL analyst Trent Dilfer and he discusses the NFL’s best all-time play callers. Free agent wide receiver Danny Amendola also stops in and talks about how hard it was to leave New England and his lasting friendship with former Patriot teammate Tom Brady.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
